title: Five- Star Excellence In Siem Reap
description: Discover the beauty of ancient Angkor Wat and historic Siem Reap, staying at one of the city’s most luxurious hotels - Belmond La Residence d’Angkor. Spend five nights in a Junior Suite and enjoy a private tour of the majestic Angkor Wat with an English speaking guide, daily breakfasts, a traditional buffet dinner, one set lunch, a nightly cocktail each and a 60-minute massage per person. Plus take the stress out of travelling with return airport transfers included.
offer_address: River Road, Siem Reap, Cambodia

title: Siem Reap Five-Star Award-Winning Retreat near UNESCO-Listed Angkor Wat with Temple Tour, Gourmet Dining & Massages
description:
Experience one of the world's most luxurious hotel brands with a stay at Anantara Angkor Resort, a five-star, all-suite sanctuary rated among the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. A stone’s throw from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Angkor Archaeological Park, one of the most mesmerising archaeological sites in Southeast Asia, this luxury hotel is surrounded by lush gardens and palm trees.

Anantara Angkor Resort is home to 39 suites, each with private courtyards, terraces, or balconies. Part of the prestigious Anantara hotel collection, the resort was named in the Top 10 Southeast Asia Resort Hotels at the Travel + Leisure 2020 World’s Best Awards, and the Top 10 Best Resorts in Asia at the Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards 2020. Discover true tranquility at Anantara Spa, where treatments combine traditional Cambodian techniques with modern wellness knowledge. Sample the finest dining at Chi, the Khmer-inspired restaurant that celebrates high-quality ingredients and progressive local influences, favourites from around the world at L Lounge, or opt for something a little more relaxed at the poolside Salt, for traditional Indonesian dishes and Western classics.
offer_address: National Road no. 6, Khum Svay Dangkom, Krong Siem Reap, Cambodia

description: Welcome to Memoire Siem Reap: a stunning resort draped in contemporary art and Cambodian charm, located 10 minutes' drive from the iconic UNESCO World Heritage site of Angkor Wat. title: Discover Cambodia’s Angkor Wat in Boutique Anantara Luxury with Full-Day Tour
description:
You're invited to experience one of the world's most luxurious hotel brands with a stay at the all-suite Anantara Angkor Resort in Siem Reap. It's here you’ll be transported to a historical world of boutique luxury like no other - and only a stone’s throw from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Angkor Wat. Includes daily buffet breakfast, a full-day tour discovering Angkor Wat and a half-day community tour, a 60-minute massage each, one decadent dinner for two, private airport transfers, nightly drinks and canapés and much more.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).

title: French Colonial Charm in the Heart of Siem Reap with Angkor Wat Tuk-Tuk Tour & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description:
Discover the unique beauty of Cambodia at the stylish FCC Angkor by AVANI, located in the heart of Siem Reap, just a 15-minute drive from the sprawling Angkor Wat temple complex. Blending a tropical modern aesthetic with French colonial charm, this heritage property features just 80 well-appointed rooms full of contemporary local touches, including artisanal textiles and bespoke furnishings. Lush greenery fills the central courtyard and surrounding grounds, while two marble-tiled swimming pools invite you to unwind in their glistening waters. The heart of FCC Angkor by AVANI is undoubtedly The Mansion restaurant, where Cambodian and international dishes are crafted with locally sourced ingredients to take your tastebuds on an unforgettable journey. After eating your fill, head to Scribe bar to indulge in imaginative cocktails alongside tapas-style bites.

FCC Angkor by AVANI's central location makes it the perfect launchpad for your Cambodian adventure. Situated in the heart of the action, the hotel makes it easy to explore the surrounding alleys and eateries, strolling through the Royal Independence Gardens or Angkor Trade Centre along the way. When you’re ready to unwind, head to the onsite spa and wellness centre, where you’ll be pampered with manicures, pedicures, reflexology massages and more rejuvenating treatments (charges apply).
offer_address: Next to the Royal Residence, Pokambor Ave, Krong Siem Reap, Cambodia

vendor_name: Sofitel Angkor Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
title: Five-Star Siem Reap French-Inspired Luxury near UNESCO-listed Angkor Wat with Five Restaurants, Free-Form Pool & Golf Course
description:
Snuggled amid tropical gardens just moments from the legendary temples of Angkor, this tranquil Sofitel hideaway in Siem Reap invites you to embrace the rich spirit of Khmer culture, with a French twist. By day, explore ancient ruins and sacred relics. By night, return to French elegance and warm Cambodian hospitality.

Indulge in soothing treatments at the award-winning Sofitel Spa, where traditional rituals meet modern wellness, or take a leisurely dip in the expansive, free-form pool. Gourmands are in for a treat with refined Khmer cuisine and French-inspired gastronomy served across the resort's five restaurants and bars. Plus, golf enthusiasts can tee off at the nearby 18-hole championship golf course.
location_description: Sofitel Angkor Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
offer_address: Vithei Charles de Gaulle Khum Svay Dang Kum Angkor, Siem Reap, Cambodia, 1010

title: Award-Winning Siem Reap Suite Escape near Angkor Wat
description:
Discover the timeless beauty of Siem Reap at Memoire Palace Resort & Spa: a stunning resort draped in contemporary art and Cambodian charm, located minutes from the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Angkor Wat. Combining contemporary architecture, traditional art and five-star service has led this stunning resort to be named among Tripadvisor's top 1% worldwide, with a Travellers' Choice Best of the Best 2020 mention among the Top 25 Hotels - Asia. Make the most of Memoire Palace's incredible location, placing you within easy reach of top Siem Reap attractions including Bayon Temple, Angkor Thom and the national museum.

Adorned with Cambodian paintings and historical pieces, the resort is set around an impressive pool surrounded by nature. Expect a long list of state-of-the-art facilities including a luxurious spa, temple-inspired restaurant and a stylish pool bar with bean bags and sunbeds.
offer_address: #026, Psar Kraoum Road Siem Reap, City 17252, Cambodia

vendor_name: Shinta Mani Angkor and Bensley Collection Pool Villas
title: Boutique Cambodia Escape near Angkor Wat with Five Restaurants & Bars
description: Discover the magic of Cambodia with a luxurious boutique escape to Shinta Mani Angkor and Bensley Collection Pool Villas, located in the heart of Siem Reap's French Quarter near the famed Angkor Wat temple complex. Designed by acclaimed architect Bill Bensley, this upscale accommodation sits next to the Siem Reap River, within easy reach of the vibrant downtown area, Kandal Village's cafés and galleries and the Royal Residence and Royal Independence Gardens. Onsite, you'll find a luxurious spa with six treatment rooms, along with five restaurants and bars offering a range of delicious fare, including burgers and sandwiches at Baitong, international bites with locally sourced ingredients at Kroya and 30 gins with thoughtful tonic pairings at Bensley's Bar.
location_description: Shinta Mani Angkor and Bensley Collection Pool Villas
offer_address: Oum Khun St and 14th street, 00000 Shinta Mani St, Krong Siem Reap, Cambodia

title: Siem Reap Art Deco Elegance near UNESCO-Listed Angkor Wat with Five Restaurants & Bars
description:
Siem Reap's premier luxury grand hotel, opened in the 1930s, this French Art Deco masterpiece is the epitome of opulence steeped in tradition. Backed by the iconic Raffles brand, famed for its colonial charm and world-class hospitality, the Grand Hotel d'Angkor weaves elegance into every element: a personal butler, optional chauffeur limousine service and a 35-meter pool reminiscent of Angkor’s ancient baths, plus saunas, steam rooms and a jacuzzi.

From champagne breakfasts at Cafe d’Angkor overlooking the pool to afternoon tea at the Conservatory accompanied by the resident pianist and nightcaps at the renowned Elephant Bar, indulgence is around every corner at Raffles Grand Hotel d'Angkor.
offer_address: 1 Vithei Charles de Gaulle Khum Svay Dang Kum, Siem Reap, Cambodia

title: Elegant Siem Reap Escape with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Pool
description:
Unearth a new level of Cambodian luxury at The Aviary Hotel, a stylish hotel in the heart of Siem Reap. Just a few minutes' stroll from the bars and restaurants of lively Pub Steet, this boutique bolthole combines the latest in luxury with an aesthetic inspired by nature and Cambodia’s rich history of crafts. Take to the streets on two feet to find most of the city’s attractions - the rest, like Angkor Wat, are an affordable remork (tuk-tuk) ride away.

When it comes time to nest, The Aviary Hotel has a flock of options. Rotate between the ground-floor and rooftop pools, both with poolside drinks and snacks, or embrace the serenity of Amret Spa with a treatment or two. Pop by The Flock Café for a coffee and light meal, admire the city’s skyline from the rooftop Glide Bar or settle in for a Japanese feast at Fumizen. Browse the boutiques of Aviary Square to find high-end fashion and artisanal goods, or lift and lunge in the state-of-the-art gym.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights only)**

- Feast every morning with **daily breakfast** at Plumage Restaurant
- Work your way through the drinks offering with a **daily cocktail each** (for stays of 2+ nights)
- Sample local and international flavours with a **set two-course lunch or dinner** (for stays of 4+ nights)
- Travel stress-free with **one-way airport transfers** (for stays of 6+ nights)

**Travelling with family?** Choose the Family Package for two adults and two children (11 and under).
offer_address: Sangkat Svaydangkum 9, Preah Sangreach Tep Vong St, Krong Siem Reap 17252, Cambodia

title: French Colonial Charm in the Heart of Siem Reap with Outstanding Khmer Restaurant
description: Discover the unique beauty of Cambodia at the elegant FCC Angkor by Avani, located in Siem Reap's Old French Quarter and surrounded by ancient wonders and nature's marvels. This neocolonial-style hotel boasts The Mansion restaurant, where Khmer and international dishes are crafted with locally sourced ingredients to take your tastebuds on an unforgettable journey. After eating your fill, head to Scribe bar to indulge in imaginative cocktails in a stylish outdoor setting.
offer_address: Pokambor Avenue, next to Royal Residence, Krong Siem Reap, Cambodia
